sys_script_include.name: CancelReservationAJAX

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_649389179350fa1005087efdfaba1079
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1782765_nowroom.CancelReservationAJAX</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>CancelReservationAJAX</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[class CancelReservationAJAX extends global.AbstractAjaxProcessor {
  doCancel() {
    try {
      const sysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
      if (!sysId) return 'Missing sys_id';

      const gr = new global.GlideRecord('x_1782765_nowroom_reservation');
      if (!gr.get(sysId)) return 'Not found';

      if (gr.getValue('opened_by') != gs.getUserID()) return 'Not allowed';

      const status = gr.getValue('reservation_status');
      if (status === 'cancelled' || status === 'rejected') return 'Already final';

      gr.setValue('reservation_status', 'cancelled'); // Choice-Value!
      gr.update();
      return 'OK';
    } catch (e) {
      gs.error('CancelReservationAJAX error: ' + e);
      return 'ERR: ' + (e && e.message ? e.message : e);
    }
  }
}
// Wichtig: KEIN module.exports
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-10-05 10:38:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>649389179350fa1005087efdfaba1079</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CancelReservationAJAX</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NowRoom" source="x_1782765_nowroom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NowRoom">699b40c09340761005087efdfaba109b</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_649389179350fa1005087efdfaba1079</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-10-05 10:52:27</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
